articles.title: Hockey P.E.I. repeals suspension for junior player who criticized handling of racist incident - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Hockey P.E.I. says it is repealing the indefinite suspension it gave to Keegan Mitchell, the junior hockey player who spoke out on social media after an opponent used an anti-Asian slur against one of his teammates in a game.
articles.content: Hockey P.E.I. says it is repealing the indefinite suspension it gave to Keegan Mitchell, the junior hockey player who publicly criticized the league's handling of a racist on-ice incident and was sub… [+2485 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Singapore amends law to allow 'no win, no fee' agreements between lawyers and clients - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Lawyers and clients in certain cases can now come to an arrangement where the clients do not have to pay legal fees if they do not win the case.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Lawyers and clients in certain cases can now come to an arrangement where the clients do not have to pay legal fees if they do not win the case.
